title: Need For Speed Unbound Revealed: A New Hope For The Franchise? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.06.22
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about the brand new Need For Speed game with a fresh new look, more Activison acquisition talk, Overwatch 2's phone situation, and Far Cry 6 GOTY edition costing $120.

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:57 - Housekeeping

A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now featuring Janet Garcia talking about Gotham Knights, Andy and I talking Overwatch 2, and our time hopping back into Mario Maker 2

ICMYI: We got some new merch! Kindafunny.com/store


It’s FINALLY happening: Friday the 14th, we’re moving into the Spare Bedroom

The Roper Report  -

00:10:22 - Need for Speed Unbound Has Finally Been Revealed
00:21:54 - Players can now link their PlayStation Network and Steam accounts
00:26:00 - The FTC could reportedly rule on Microsoft’s Activision deal by late November
00:30:09 - Ad
00:32:24 - Blizzard is scrapping that phone number requirement for Overwatch 2, at least for a 'Majority' of Players
00:37:18 - PlatinumGames is sorry about Babylon’s Fall
00:41:35 - The Far Cry 6 Game of the Year Edition is out and it’s $120
00:45:42 - Pete Hines just got a promotion
00:47:20 - Out today
00:49:17 - “Do you think there will be a new Mario game released next year sometime close to when the movie comes out?” - Marco Hutchens
01:00:15 - Squad Up: Branddnh - PS5, Xbox - ProphetGK
01:00:46 - REQUIRED READING: https://bit.ly/3V71lpo
01:02:48 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Bless
